name: Cactus Farmer!
description:
hey you! you like to farm cactus? no? great! play this game to farm the cactus!

play as Pablo, the greatest cactus farmer in history! make as much money as you can! but watch̴ out,҉ t͘h͟er͞e ̶more̸ ̕dan͡g̨ers̷ to̕ c̨a̡ct͟u͢s̶ ̸farm̛in͞g͟ ҉than y͜o͢u͢ wo҉ul͠d͟ t̛hink͟!

download and play for free today!
